author: mriou
msg: ODE-176 Depth should be increased even without state change.

author: hogstrom
msg: Changing version to 2.0.1-SNAPSHOT from 2.0.1.  I am doing this in an attempt to use the Maven Release plugin.  I may need to back this off later but in order to do this with Maven I need this committed and not as a local change.

author: aconway
msg: Combined into a single preftest.cpp executable and moved to
- Can be run as producer (--listen), consumer (--publish) or both.
- --count specifies number of messages (default 500000 as before)
